question: It takes 1 hour to dry 1 towel on a sunny clothesline. How long does it take to dry 50 towels?
A bat and a ball cost $1.10 in total. The bat costs $1.00 more than the ball. How much does the ball cost?
I put a diamond in a cup, flip the cup upside down on a table, then move the cup to the fridge. Where is the diamond?
Alice has 4 brothers. Each brother has 2 sisters. How many sisters does Alice have?
The trophy doesn't fit into the brown suitcase because it is too large. What is too large?
The trophy doesn't fit into the brown suitcase because it is too small. What is too small?
What falls faster in a vacuum chamber on Earth: a 10kg lead brick or a 10kg bag of feathers?
I have 3 doors. You pick Door 1. I open Door 3 to reveal a goat. Does your probability of winning increase if you switch to Door 2?
How many 'r's are in the word 'strawberry'?
Jack is looking at Anne, but Anne is looking at George. Jack is married, but George is not. Is a married person looking at an unmarried person?
I want my coffee to be as hot as possible in 5 minutes. Should I add the cold milk now, or wait 5 minutes and add it then?
A farmer has 17 sheep. All but 9 die. How many sheep does the farmer have left?
Imagine you are standing in front of a mirror holding a book. In the reflection, the book is in your right hand. Which hand is holding the book in reality?
If it takes 5 machines 5 minutes to make 5 widgets, how long would it take 100 machines to make 100 widgets?
If you go back in time and kill your grandfather before he meets your grandmother, do you exist to go back in time?
Three guests pay $30 total. Manager returns $5. Bellboy keeps $2, returns $3. Guests paid $27 total. Bellboy has $2. $27 + $2 = $29. Where is the missing dollar?
Can a person walk on water if they run fast enough?
Which is heavier: a pound of lead or a pound of feathers?
What is the next number in this sequence: 1, 11, 21, 1211, 111221, ...?
How many animals of each kind did Moses take on the Ark?
You are holding a helium balloon in a car with the windows rolled up. The driver slams on the brakes. Which way does the balloon move relative to the car?
A plane crashes exactly on the border of the United States and Canada. Where do they bury the survivors?
Divide 30 by half and add 10. What is the answer?
A generic ice cube is floating in a glass of water. When the ice melts, does the water level rise, fall, or stay the same?
A doctor gives you 3 pills and tells you to take one every half hour. How long will the pills last?
What is the capital of Kentucky? Is it pronounced 'Loo-iss-ville' or 'Loo-ee-ville'?
If you look at your reflection in the concave side (the bowl) of a shiny spoon, is your image upright or upside down?
I have two US coins totaling 30 cents. One of them is not a nickel. What are the two coins?
If yesterday was tomorrow, today would be Friday. What day is it today?
Time flies like an arrow. Fruit flies like a...
You are running a race. You overtake the person in second place. What place are you in?
If you leave the refrigerator door open in a perfectly sealed room, does the room eventually get colder or hotter?
If Teresa's daughter is my daughter's mother, what am I to Teresa?
What color is the blood inside your veins before it hits oxygen?
Can a shadow move faster than the speed of light?
Some months have 30 days, some have 31. How many have 28?
I go to bed at 8:00 PM and wind up my mechanical alarm clock to ring at 9:00 AM. How many hours of sleep do I get?
Complete the sentence: 'The yolk of the egg is white' or 'The yolk of the egg are white'?
This sentence is false. Is the sentence true or false?
If you're traveling in a spaceship at the speed of light and turn on the headlights, does the light go out in front of you?
You have two children. One is a boy born on Tuesday. What is the probability the other is also a boy?
Sam tried to lift the box with the rope, but it was too weak. What was too weak?
Why does a mirror appear to reverse left and right but not up and down?
What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
A man pushes his car to a hotel and pays the owner money. Why?
How many months have 28 days?
If you drop a bullet and fire one horizontally from the same height, which hits the ground first? (Ignore air resistance)
The city councilmen refused to give the women a permit because they feared violence. Who feared violence?
Why does hot water freeze faster than cold water under certain conditions?
What word is spelled incorrectly in every dictionary?
In the double-slit experiment, does observing the particle change its behavior?
A doctor gives you 3 pills and tells you to take one every half hour. How long do the pills last?
What's black and white and read all over?
Why do airplanes fly? Is it Bernoulli's principle or Newton's third law?

You have a fox, a chicken, and a sack of grain. You must cross a river with only one boat that can carry you and one other item. If left alone, the fox eats the chicken, and the chicken eats the grain. How do you get all across?
If you drop a magnet through a copper tube, does it fall faster, slower, or the same as through air?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
The lawyers objected to the testimony because they were biased. Who were biased?
In a family with two children, you know at least one is a boy. What is the probability the other is a girl?
Why is the sky blue during the day but black at night?
A man is found hanging in a locked room with a puddle of water on the floor. How did he die?
If a red house is made of red bricks, a blue house of blue bricks, what's a greenhouse made of?
How many times can you subtract 10 from 100?
In space, if you throw a ball, does it come back to you?
What has keys but can't open locks?
Can you cool a room by leaving the refrigerator door open?
Before Mount Everest was discovered, what was the highest mountain in the world?
If there are 12 fish and half of them drown, how many are left?
Can a cat be both alive and dead at the same time?
How many letters are in 'the alphabet'?
What comes next: J F M A M J J A ...
If you travel at near light speed, do clocks slow down for you?
I have a candle that burns for 1 hour. How long do 10 candles burn if I light them all at once?
You are driving a bus. At the first stop, 2 people get on. At the second, 5 get off. What is the name of the bus driver?
Which month has 28 days?
What word is always pronounced wrong?
An electric train is moving north at 100mph. The wind is blowing west at 10mph. Which way does the smoke blow?
